statements: SELECT * FROM performance_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, transit_time FROM performance_reports WHERE shipment_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(transit_time) AS avg_transit_time FROM performance_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, delay_reason FROM performance_reports WHERE transit_time > 5;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE transit_time > 5 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, delay_reason FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01' AND transit_time < 10;
SELECT shipment_id, transit_time FROM performance_reports WHERE delay_reason IS NULL ORDER BY transit_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE shipment_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) AND delay_reason LIKE '%weather%';
SELECT report_id, shipment_id, delay_reason FROM performance_reports WHERE transit_time > 7 AND delay_reason IN ('traffic', 'mechanical') ORDER BY report_id ASC, delay_reason DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, destination_location, shipment_cost FROM shipments WHERE shipment_cost > 100;
SELECT source_location, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT report_id, report_date, delivery_days FROM performance_reports WHERE delivery_days < 3;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_cost > 1000 ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, source_location, destination_location FROM shipments WHERE shipment_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE source_location = 'New York' AND destination_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT shipments.*, performance_reports.delivery_status FROM shipments JOIN performance_reports ON shipments.shipment_id = performance_reports.shipment_id WHERE performance_reports.delivery_days > 5;
SELECT source_location, COUNT(*) as shipments_count FROM shipments GROUP BY source_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY shipments_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM shipments
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_date FROM shipments
SELECT shipper_name, contact_number FROM shippers
SELECT report_id, delivery_status FROM performance_reports
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name FROM shipments WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipper_name, contact_number FROM shippers WHERE shipper_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM shipments ORDER BY delivery_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT p.report_id, p.delivery_status, s.shipper_name FROM performance_reports p INNER JOIN shippers s ON p.shipper_id = s.shipper_id WHERE p.delivery_duration > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, product_name FROM shipments WHERE destination_city='New York';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, destination_city FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, available_quantity FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_phone) > 10;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE delivery_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, shipper_name, shipment_weight FROM shipments WHERE shipment_weight > 1000;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_id, report_type FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT shipment_id, status FROM shipping_performance WHERE status = 'DELIVERED';
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE report_type = 'daily' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, shipper_name, shipment_weight FROM shipments WHERE shipment_weight > 100 ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT s.shipper_name, sl.log_date, sl.log_text FROM shipments s JOIN shipping_logs sl ON s.shipment_id = sl.shipment_id WHERE sl.log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sl.log_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sp.shipment_id, sp.performance_rating, sp.delivery_time, s.recipient_name FROM shipping_performance sp JOIN shipments s ON sp.shipment_id = s.shipment_id WHERE sp.status = 'delivered' ORDER BY sp.delivery_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT pm.metric_name, pm.metric_value, sp.performance_rating FROM performance_metrics pm JOIN shipping_performance sp ON pm.metric_date = sp.delivery_time ORDER BY pid ASC LIMIT 5;
